Title: Requires electronic benefit transfer systems to allow for benefit recipients to provide certain services when fraud has been suspected or reported
Summary: Requires electronic benefit transfer systems to allow for benefit recipients to cancel, lock or unlock a card associated with electronic benefit transfer services when fraud has been suspected or reported; amends the effectiveness thereof.
LawCode: Amd ยง21-a, Soc Serv L; amd ยง2, Chap of 2024 (as proposed in S.8662-A & A.9269-B)
ActClause: AN ACT to amend the social services law, in relation to requiring electronic benefit transfer systems to provide for benefit recipients to be able to cancel, lock or unlock a card associated with electronic benefit transfer services; and to amend a chapter of the laws of 2024 amending the social services law relating to requiring electronic benefit transfer systems to provide for benefit recipients to be able to cancel, lock or unlock a credit or debit card associated with electronic benefit transfer services, as proposed in legislative bills numbers S.8662-A and A.9269-B, in relation to the effectiveness thereof
